1.title: How to Plan the American Dream
1.plot: Alexi helps provide a smooth transition to a family with an e-commerce business in the middle of relocating to a new state.

2.title: On the Road with Home Safety & Technology
2.plot: Keeping a family safe; Alexi explores the importance of pool care; gun safety in the home.

3.title: Yours, Mine & Our Generation Part One
3.plot: Designer Alena Capra helps millennial newlyweds and first-time homeowners get their new home started.

4.title: Yours, Mine & Our Generation Part Two
4.plot: Members of a Miami family dedicate their time to empowering surrounding communities; learning about saving for college, retirement and other future expenses.

5.title: Yours, Mine & Our Generation Part Three
5.plot: A husband and wife whose three sons have moved out of the house turn their empty nest into a smart home.

6.title: The Joy of Pets
6.plot: Pet rescue and adoption; microchip technology helps reunite lost pets with their owners; keeping a horse stable smelling fresh.

7.title: Episode #3.7
7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Alexi Panos and her building team are tasked with two home improvement assignments. The first assignment is to the rescue Nancy and her family who are living in clutter and chaos. The second assignment, is to transform an energy efficient living space for Michelle & Dan Beaver. Will the building team provide solutions and complete this mission?

2.title: I'm Coming Home - The Story of Anne
2.plot: Alexi Panos and her building team travel back to Colorado on a very special mission. In this three part series of I'm Coming Home Part One they meet three extraordinary veterans to help them to rebuild their lives in order to transition back to civilian life more easily. The team also learns about what doors, dishes and devotion have in common.

3.title: I'm Coming Home - The Story of Thomas
3.plot: Alexi and her building team travel to Minnesota to continue their mission of I'm Coming Home Part 2. They secure and transform an empty house into a beautiful and loving home. Alexi brings caring organizations and amazing people together to create a dream come true.

4.title: I'm Coming Home - The Story of Brandon
4.plot: This week Alexi and her building team travel to Florida to complete their mission of I'm Coming Home Part 3. They get up front and personal with this hero and his family by creating special spaces with technology and nostalgia. Surprises and new traditions are made for a bright and sunny future.

1.title: The Story of Randy & Laura Myer
1.plot: In the season two premiere of Operation Build, Alexi helps the Myers family become a first time home owner with the guidance of PrimeLending; The family learns the ease and importance of do-it-yourself home security with D-Link; And the Myers new home gets a fresh carpet cleaning courtesy of Rug Doctor.

2.title: The Story of Carina
2.plot: Alexi and her build team travel to Sunrise, Florida to help a family in need. With the help of Cree LED Bulbs, Polk Audio, WriteyBoard and DreamWorks Animation, watch a house become a home with a complete transformation.

3.title: The Story of the Empty Nesters
3.plot: Alexi and her team help a couple create an outdoor oasis in their backyard after their children have all moved out of the house. Joining the team is Morton Salt, Maytronics, Arctic Spas, and Americana Building Products.

4.title: A History of a Movement
4.plot: Operation Build celebrates Earth Day with some of the world's greenest corporations in America. Joining the show is Ego, Ox Industries, and Waterco.

5.title: The Story of the Hoffmans
5.plot: After a life changing accident several years ago, Bruce Hoffman Is not able to be as active as he once was. Like many other homeowners, his garage space has become somewhat of a forgotten room. With the help of Flow Wall and Fujitsu General America, we give Bruce's garage a complete makeover.

6.title: Water Pressure and Lighting Solutions
6.plot: Alexi travels to Naples, FL to see the installation of a water pressure system by Franklin Electric. Then, she travels to Boca Raton, FL to meet up with Andrew and the folks from American Lighting Association and Capitol Lighting to showcase exceptional home lighting.

7.title: A Labor of Love - The Ronald McDonald House Part 1
7.plot: Insight Television Productions is proud to present Part One of a four part mini-series featuring Ronald McDonald House Charities. Alexi, Andrew, and Alena travel to Ft. Lauderdale, FL to give the families and staff at RMHC a much needed renovation to their kitchen, dinning area, and offices.

8.title: RMHC Part Two - The Story of Shiloh
8.plot: Part two of the four part mini-series creating a home away from home with Ronald McDonald House Charities. The story of Shiloh with Pony Tools, EGE and Simple Science.

9.title: RMHC Part Three - The Story of Atalaya
9.plot: Part three of the four part mini-series creating a home away from home with Ronald McDonald House Charities. The story of Atalaya with Miracle Sealants and AR Valve.

10.title: RMCH Part Four - The Story of Herzona
10.plot: Part four of the four part mini-series creating a home away from home with Ronald McDonald House Charities. The story of Herzona with Bush Industries and Xerox.

11.title: Operation Build Green
11.plot: Co-host Andrew Dan-Jumbo takes a tour of the AERCO International factory in NY and the Insight Television Productions studio gets a brand new carpet in on of its conference rooms thanks to Armor Lock Industries

imdb.plot outline: Operation Build Green explores the Green Building Movement and how we must all do our part in building a better tomorrow. The show unites with environmental experts, green associations, and the world's leading corporations that make a difference to our planet. Through education, empowerment, and real life entertainment, the show uncovers the green building envelope and how to "rethink" and to "reconsider" the environment as part of our economy, health, and our community. The show provides eco-friendly solutions to create healthier places to live, work and play in by effectively respecting and protecting our planet, "Mother Earth".
imdb.title: Operation Build
plot: _Operation Build_ (qv) travels all over the country discovering great home improvement concepts in renovations, remodels, and do-it-yourself projects.

The show unites with environmental experts, green associations, and the world's leading corporations that make a difference to our planet. Through education, empowerment, and real life entertainment, the show uncovers the green building envelope and how to "rethink" and to "reconsider" the environment as part of our economy, health, and our community. The show provides eco-friendly solutions to create healthier places to live, work and play in by effectively respecting and protecting our planet, "Mother Earth".
